article_title: Swinney calls on UK government to recognise Palestinian state
sentence: Israel's  military  campaign  in  Gaza  began  after  gunmen  from  Hamas  attacked  Israel  on  7  October,  killing  about  1,200  people  and  taking  252  others  back  to  Gaza  as  hostages.

article_title: Swinney calls on UK government to recognise Palestinian state
sentence: Nearly  36,000  Palestinians  have  been  killed  in  the  war  since  then,  according  to  Gaza's  Hamas-run  health  ministry.
